attributes.action: extend the right to request flexible working hours from parents to all workers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Flexible working for all would reduce commuter congestion, allow ordinary workers to travel off-peak (saving money), allow workers to volunteer, spend more time exercising or with their family in order to redress the crazy work–life imbalance currently present in the UK. Unless there is a sound business case against flexible working hours, employers should be encouraged to allow employees to negotiate start/end times.
